context_bundle.summary: Eventual consistency: System becomes consistent over time, not immediately. BASE (Basically Available, Soft state, Eventual consistency) vs ACID. Use for high availability over strong consistency. Handle stale reads, conflict resolution (last-write-wins, vector clocks, CRDTs).

onboarding.quick_start: Eventual consistency: System becomes consistent over time, not immediately. BASE (Basically Available, Soft state, Eventual consistency) vs ACID.
